thread.title: Darden Restaurants to buy Cheddar's Scratch Kitchen for $780 million
thread.title_full: Darden Restaurants to buy Cheddar's Scratch Kitchen for $780 million

title: Darden Restaurants to buy Cheddar's Scratch Kitchen for $780 million
text:
Darden Restaurants to buy Cheddar's Scratch Kitchen for $780 million 11 Mins Ago Source: Cheddar's Scratch Kitchen Cheddar's Scratch Kitchen 
Olive Garden owner Darden Restaurants said on Monday it would buy Cheddar's Scratch Kitchen for $780 million in an all-cash transaction. 
Darden would buy the restaurant chain from its shareholders including private equity firms L Catterton and Oak Investment Partners. 
The restaurant operator also released its third-quarter earnings report after the stock market closed on Monday, and its results exceeded analyst expectations. 
Revenue for the company came in at $1.88 billion, slightly above Wall Street's expectation of $1.86 billion, according to Thomson Reuters consensus estimates. The company reported earnings per share above the Street's estimate by 5 cents. Darden reported earnings of $1.32 per share, versus $1.27 per share predicted by analysts, according to Thomson Reuters consensus estimates. 
â€” CNBC contributed to this report. Related Securities
